attack.name: Time Bellow
attack.text: Draw a card.

attack.name: Flash Cannon
attack.text: You may return all Energy cards attached to Dialga to your hand. If you do, remove the highest Stage Evolution card from the Defending Pokémon and shuffle that card into your opponent's deck.

pokepower.name: DarkPalm
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if your opponent has 4 or more Benched Pokémon, you may choose 1 of them and shuffle that Pokémon and all cards attached to it into his or her deck. This power can't be used if Dusknoir is affected by a Special Condition.

attack.name: Hard Feelings
attack.text: Put 5 damage counters on the Defending Pokémon. Then, count the number of Prize cards your opponent has taken and put that many damage counters on the Defending Pokémon.

pokepower.name: Intense Voltage
pokepower.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), if Elekid is anywhere under Electivire, you may move a {L} Energy attached to 1 of your Pokémon to Electivire. This power can't be used if Electivire is affected by a Special Condition.

attack.name: Giga Impact
attack.text: You may discard all {L} Energy attached to Electivire. If you do, this attack's base damage is 120 instead of 60.

attack.name: Ice Blade
attack.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 40 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attack.name: Aqua Jet
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attack.name: Meteor Punch
attack.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attack.name: Flare Blitz
attack.text: Discard all {R} Energy attached to Infernape.

attack.name: Feint
attack.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

attack.name: Aura Sphere
attack.text: Does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

pokepower.name: Sharp Eye
pokepower.text: Once during your turn, when you play Luxray from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may look at your opponent's hand. If your opponent's Bench isn't full, choose 1 Basic Pokémon from your opponent's hand, and put it onto his or her Bench. Then, switch it with the Defending Pokémon.

attack.name: Lightning Star
attack.text: Move all {L} Energy attached to Luxray to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. (Ignore this effect if you don't have any Benched Pokémon.)

pokebody.name: Magnetize
pokebody.text: If you have any {M} Energy attached to your Active Pokémon, the Retreat Cost for that Pokémon is 0

attack.name: Metal Blast
attack.text: Does 50 damage plus 10 more damage for each {M} Energy attached to Magnezone.

attack.name: Call for Family
attack.text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attack.name: Aqua Ring
attack.text: Switch Manaphy with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attack.name: Avenge
attack.text: Count the number of your pokemon that have any damage counters on them. Put that many damage counters on the Defending Pokemon.

attack.name: Psywave
attack.text: Does 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.

attack.name: Spacial Rend
attack.text: Search your deck for a Stadium card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. If there is any Stadium card in play, discard it.

attack.name: Transback
attack.text: You may flip a coin. If heads, discard all Energy attached to Palkia and put the Defending Pokemon and all cards attached to it on top of your opponents deck. Your opponent shuffles his or her deck afterward.

pokepower.name: Earth Fissure
pokepower.text: Once during your turn, when you play Rhyperior from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon, you may discard the top 3 cards from your opponent's deck.

attack.name: Rock Wrecker
attack.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance. Rhyperior can't attack during your next turn.

attack.name: Poison Sting
attack.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned

attack.name: Spike Whip
attack.text: If Budew is anywhere under Roserade, choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. This attack does 30 damage to that pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for that Benched Pokemon.)

pokepower.name: Darkness Fan
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 Evolved Pokemon on your opponent's Bench, remove the highest Stage Evolution card from that Pokemon, and put it back into his or her hand. This power can't be used if Shiftry is affected by a Special Condition.

attack.name: Spirit Dance
attack.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

attack.name: Frustration
attack.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon that doesn't have any damage counters on it. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Toxic Cloud
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. Put 2 damage counters instead of 1 on the Defending Pokemon between turns.

attack.name: Accelerative Dive
attack.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, prevent all damage done to Staraptor by attacks (both yours and your opponent's) until the end of your next turn.

attack.name: Brave Heart
attack.text: Flip a coin. If tails, Staraptor does 100 damage to itself.

attack.name: Body Slame
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attack.name: Leaf Storm
attack.text: Remove 2 damage counters from each of your {G} Pokemon.

attack.name: Defense Curl
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Azumarill during your opponent's next turn.

attack.name: Bubble Pump
attack.text: If Azumarill has 3 or more Energy attached to it, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage. If Azurill is anywhere under Azumarill, flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attack.name: Whirlwind
attack.text: Your opponent swithces the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.

attack.name: Giga Drain
attack.text: After your attack, remove from Beautifly the number of damage counters equal to the damage you did to the Defending Pokemon.

attack.name: Rest
attack.text: Remove all Special Conditions and 4 damage counters from Bibarel. Bibarel is now Asleep.

attack.name: Take Down
attack.text: Bibarel does 10 damage to itself.

attack.name: Swallow Up
attack.text: Before doing damage, count rhe remaining HP of the Defending Pokemon and Carnivine. If the Defening Pokemon has fewer remaining HP than Carnivine's, this attack does 60 damage instead.

attack.name: Wring out
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defening Pokemon is noew Paralyzed and discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

attack.name: Double Slap
attack.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attack.name: Metronome
attack.text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokemon's attacks. Metronome copies that attack except its Energy cost. (You must still do anything else in order to use that attack.) Clefable performs that attack.

attack.name: Stomp
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

attack.name: Poison Claws
attack.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

attack.name: Wind Wave
attack.text: Search your discard pile for up to 5 in any combination of Pokemon and Supporter cards. Show them to your opponent and shuffle them into your deck.

attack.name: Explosive Smoke
attack.text: Does 10 damage to each Benched Pokemon (both yours and your opponent's). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Stun Spore
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokmeon is now Paralyzed.

attack.name: Toxic Dust
attack.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisnoned. Put 2 damage counters instead of 1 on the Defending Pokemon between turns.

attack.name: Screw Tail
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.

attack.name: Water Gun
attack.text: Does 40 damage plus 20 more damage for each {W} Energy attached to Floatzel but not used to pay fpr this attack's Energy cost. You can't add mre than 40 damage in this way.

attack.name: Life Drain
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, put damage counters on the defending Pokemon until it is 10 HP away from being knocked out.

attack.name: Shadow Dance
attack.text: Put 4 damage counters on your opponent's Pokemon in any way you like. Then, switch Gengar with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

attack.name: Pitch
attack.text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 d his or her Benched Pokemon.

attack.name: Horn Slash
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage.

attack.name: Vacuum Up
attack.text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attack.name: Sand Eject
attack.text: During your next turn, if an attack does damage to the Defending Pokemon (after applying Weakness and Resistance), that attack does 40 more damage.

attack.name: Healing Wish
attack.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. Remove a number of damage counters equal to the number of heads from 1 f your Pokemon.

attack.name: Flop
attack.text: Does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon) You may switch Lopunny with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

attack.name: Revenge
attack.text: If any of your Pokemon were knocked out by damage from an opponent's attack during his or her last turn, this attack does 20 damage plus 50 more damage.

attack.name: Dynamic Punch
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 60 damage plus 30 more damage and the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

attack.name: Force Palm
attack.text: Count the number of damage counters on Medicham. Put that many damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokemon.

attack.name: Spinning Kick
attack.text: Medicham does 20 damage to itself.

pokepower.name: Baby Evolution
pokepower.text: Once before your turn (before your attack), you may put Snorlax from your hand onto Munchlax (this counts as evolving Munchlax) and remove all damage counters from Munchlax.

attack.name: Heave
attack.text: Discard 2 cards from your hand. (If you can't discard 2 cards, this attack does nothing.) Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attack.name: See Beyond
attack.text: Choose a card from your hand and put it as a Prize card face up. Then, choose 1 of your face-down Prize cards without looking and put it into your hand. This attack does nothing if all your Prize cards are face up.

attack.name: Extrasensory
attack.text: If you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent, this attack does 30 damage plus 50 more damage.

attack.name: Mirror Errand-Running
attack.text: Search your deck for a basic Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attack.name: Thunder Jolt
attack.text: Flip a coin. If tails, Pachirisu does 10 damage to itself.

attack.name: High Hat
attack.text: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking and discard it.

attack.name: Body Slam
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

trainer.text: Remove all Special Conditions from each of your Active Pokémon.
Flip 3 coins. For each heads, put a basic Energy card from your discard pile into your hand. If you don't have that many basic Energy cards in your discard pile, put all of them into your hand.

supporter.text: You can play only one Supporter card each turn. When you play this card, put it next to your Active Pokémon. When your turn ends, discard this card. Choose 1 card in your hand and shuffle the rest of your cards into your deck. Then, draw 4 cards. (If this is the only card in your hand, you can't play this card.)

You can play only one Supporter card each turn. When you play this card, put it next to your Active Pokémon. When your turn ends, discard this card. Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Your opponent chooses 3 of those cards. Put those cards into your hand and put other 2 cards on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward.

stadium.text: This card stays in play when you play it. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play. If another card with the same name is in play, you can't play this card. Once during each player's turn, the player may flip a coin until he or she gets tails. For each heads, that player draws a card.

pokepower.name: Supreme Command
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may choose up to 2 cards from your opponent's hand without looking and put them face down next to the Defending Pokémon. (These cards are not in play or in your opponent's hand.) At the end of your opponent's next turn, return those cards to your opponent's hand. This power can't be used if Empoleon is affected by a Special Condition.

attack.name: Hydro Impact
attack.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 80 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Empoleon can't attack during your next turn.
